title: Spirit Untamed
description: Lucky Prescott's life is changed forever when she moves from her home in the city to a small frontier town and befriends a wild mustang named Spirit.

reviews.text: This is only cheap low budget 3d trash, seriously DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME, just watch the original movie that remains incredible even now. All the "professional" reviewer that gave this film a sufficient mark and above should be fired on spot because they are simply incompetent.
One Of DreamWorks’s WorstThough I’d prefer this any day over Shrek The Third, Spirit Untamed is just your typical bland kids movie that beams with mediocrity.

The animation is ugly to the point of disturbing, a simple and predictable narrative structure. I honestly didn't see any difference between the animation of this film, animation 10 years ago, a CUTSCENE of PS3. In the narrative question one can compare with any animated 3D series of children's channels made to fill schedule and pluck money with toys.
